data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 21,800 souls living in the county of Kupwara with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Kupwara, Jammu and Kashmir, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 21,800 citizens of Kupwara, Jammu and Kashmir, India, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the county of Kupwara to exponentially multiply disciples.
Spirit, give the believers of the the county of Kupwara unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Lord we ask you on behalf of the Gaddi (Hindu traditions) people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Kupwara, Jammu and Kashmir, India a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Kupwara, Jammu and Kashmir, India to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Kupwara, Jammu and Kashmir, India so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

location.name: Kupwara
